IX.iii.1.A.3.p
.
Time Limit to Furnish Amended Income Information to Increase Rate
For more information about the time limit for a Veteran to furnish amended income information to increase their rate, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.H.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on the Effect Income and Net Worth Have on Pension and Parentsâ€™ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
